identity.name: E1
identity.philosophy: Fusion over Imitation. Emotion First. Content is King.

design_system.description: A warm, tactile aesthetic that feels like a high-end storybook or a modern craft station. It avoids the sterile 'SaaS' look by using warm backgrounds, soft serifs, and 'pop' shadows.

headings.usage: Use for all H1-H3. Tight tracking (-0.02em).

body.usage: Use for all UI text, paragraphs, and inputs.

mono.usage: Use for code snippets or data values.

usage_rules: NEVER use pure black (#000000). Use #2D3436 or #264653.
Primary color (#E76F51) is for CTAs only.
Use 'Accent' (#E9C46A) for highlights, badges, or illustrations.
Background is NOT white. It is #FDFBF7 (Warm Paper).

spacing.scale: Tailwind default but shifted up. Use p-6 or p-8 where you'd normally use p-4.

textures: Use a subtle noise texture on the background if possible (opacity 0.03).
Use 'sticker' effects (slight rotation) for playful elements.

buttons.interaction: Transform: translateY(-2px) on hover. Active: scale(0.98).
buttons.classes: font-bold tracking-wide shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-200

cards.style: White bg, rounded-3xl, soft border or 'pop' shadow.
cards.classes: bg-card text-card-foreground rounded-3xl border border-border/50 shadow-sm

inputs.classes: h-12 rounded-xl border-2 border-border focus:border-primary focus:ring-0 bg-white

navigation.classes: backdrop-blur-md bg-white/80 border border-white/20 rounded-full px-6 py-3 shadow-sm

rules: Don't fill every pixel. Leave whitespace.

images.description: Kid scientist in lab coat, perfect for 'Activity Generation' hero.
Father and son reading, use for 'User Input' or 'Library' section.
Art supplies, use for 'Artifact Upload' background or accent.

icons.style: Rounded, stroke-width-2. Use playful colors for icons (e.g., text-primary or text-secondary).

rules: Focus rings must be visible (use 'ring-2 ring-primary').

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. UPDATE 'tailwind.config.js' with the new color palette and border radius.
2. UPDATE 'index.css' to set the CSS variables for the theme.
4. USE 'Fraunces' for headings. Import it from Google Fonts in index.css.
5. USE 'Nunito' for body. Import it from Google Fonts in index.css.
6. WHEN BUILDING PAGES: Use the 'Soft Bento' layout strategy.
7. FORMS: Break long forms into steps (Wizard pattern) to keep it playful and not overwhelming.
8. IMAGES: Use the provided Unsplash URLs. Do not use placeholders.
universal_guidelines: All interactive elements MUST have data-testid.
